channel.title: Need a Client Background
channel.description:
I need a background for my client, just want it to follow these requirements:
Image: my server is about pking, so try to get something along those lines Text: Project PK (please make it look somewhat good at least...) Colors: w/e looks good i guess, i wante there to be red and/or blue tho... Theme: somethin that looks good again..
I kind of made the image and stuff easiest to make as possible.
If you make a picture, just post it here or pm me with it.
Thanks alot!

item.title: Need a Client Background

item.description:
